weighted indexes that exclude companies from underlying MSCI indexes ("Parent Indexes") based on

well as tobacco, palm oil and arctic oil & gas or  
* Companies that are assigned an MSCI ESG Rating of 'CCC' or  
* Companies that derive revenues from thermal coal power and extraction of select fossil fuels  or 
* Companies that are involved in Red Flag ESG controversies, Orange Flag Land Use and Biodiversity 
controversies or Orange Flag Supply Chain Management controversies  or 
* Compan ies that are not in compliance with the United Nations Global Compact principles  
In addition, the Indexes target a minimum 30% reduction in carbon emission intensity relative to the 
underlying parent indexes ("Parent Indexes")1. 1 The Indexes are governed by a set of methodology and policy documents ("Methodology Set"), including the present i ndex
